physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Height: 157.5 cm, Weight: 54.9 kg; Multiple healed pink scars on the chest, abdomen, inguinal folds, and scalp; Active ulcers on the back in various stages of healing; Broaad erosions on the hard and soft palate.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: White-cell count: 9800 per cubic millimeter; Sodium: 134 mmol per liter; Potassium: 5.4 mmol per liter (reference range, 3.4 to 4.8); Chloride: 95 mmol per liter.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: New crusted erosions on back, soreness of tongue, examination revealed white plaques on lateral edges of tongue.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reported less discomfort of oral mucosa and resolution of hoarseness. New painful lesions on back developed.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: White-cell count: 11,900 per cubic millimeter (88% neutrophils); Urinalysis showed glucose 2+ (300 to 500 mg per deciliter [16.7 to 27.8 mmol per liter]).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Urinalysis revealed trace amounts of blood, 3 to 4 red cells, 10 to 15 bacteria, and 3 to 10 epithelial cells per high-power field.
